p:
However, recent studies have indicated that patients with SARS-CoV2 infection admitted to an ICU have significantly lower levels of cytokine production, as compared to sepsis-related ARDS.
16 Therefore, such findings dispute a relevance of “cytokine storm” in COVID-19–related development of severe respiratory dysfunction and failure. These findings also indicate that more research is needed to better define the pathophysiology of SARS-CoV2and associated immunosuppression.
